text:
Thinle Lhondup (), also known as Thinley or Thinlen, (1943/1944 – April 24, 2016) was a popular Nepalese actor. He was best known for his role in the Academy Award-nominated movie "Himalaya" (1999). Thinle appears in some music videos in Nepal as well.
Thinle died on April 24, 2016 in Kathmandu, Nepal from stomach cancer, aged 72.
